<script>
(function(){
  const sections = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.series-section'));
  const btns = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.btn-filter'));
  const copyBtn = document.getElementById('copy-link');
  const printBtn = document.getElementById('print-page');

  function applyView(view){
    sections.forEach(sec => {
      const s = sec.getAttribute('data-series');
      if (view === 'both' || view === s) {
        sec.style.display = '';
      } else {
        sec.style.display = 'none';
      }
    });
    btns.forEach(b => b.setAttribute('aria-pressed', b.dataset.view === view ? 'true' : 'false'));
    // update hash so the view is shareable
    history.replaceState(null, '', '#' + view);
  }

  // Read initial view from hash, default to 'both'
  const initial = (location.hash || '#both').replace('#','');
  applyView(['cafe', 'external', 'both'].includes(initial) ? initial : 'both');

  // Button handlers
  btns.forEach(b => b.addEventListener('click', () => applyView(b.dataset.view)));

  copyBtn?.addEventListener('click', async () => {
    try {
      await navigator.clipboard.writeText(location.href);
      copyBtn.textContent = 'Link copied!';
      setTimeout(() => copyBtn.textContent = 'Copy link', 1600);
    } catch(e) {
      alert('Link: ' + location.href);
    }
  });

  printBtn?.addEventListener('click', () => {
    // Ensure both are visible before printing
    const current = (location.hash || '#both').replace('#','');
    applyView('both');
    window.print();
    // restore after a tick
    setTimeout(() => applyView(current), 0);
  });

  // Also allow hash navigation (e.g., someone edits the URL)
  window.addEventListener('hashchange', () => {
    const v = (location.hash || '#both').replace('#','');
    applyView(['cafe','external','both'].includes(v) ? v : 'both');
  });
})();
</script>
